ygData.subject: Pred base
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She looked at Drillbit who was sitting next to her. You really think we could pull this whole thing off huh? Nah, I m having my doubts.  I need everyone

::KitKat:;

She looked at Drillbit who was sitting next to her. "You really think 
we could pull this whole thing off huh? Nah, I'm having my doubts.  I 
need everyone involved and to get along with each other just long 
enough to pull it off. And I got the feeling it isn't going to 
happen. For one, Terrorsaur doesn't like the plan at all and probably 
won't talk to me about it.  For two, I have two bots who are still in 
the training stages. They can fight, but they need to understand and 
know more about what we are dealing with. That could take months.  
And for three, if Terrorsaur tells Megatron, I might as well blow my 
own head off because Megatron will most likely do it for me." she 
gave a deep sigh. "Nah, it will never work." She finishe her drink in 
one gulp and went back to get another.  She sat back down and downed 
half of her second drink in one swallow. "Nah, it just won't work. 
I'm sorry Drillbit."  She stared at her glass.
